member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Core.AgUiWindowsCollection
member.summary: Provides methods and properties to manage the windows.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Core.AgUiWindowsCollection.Arrange(AGI.Ui.Core.AgEArrangeStyle)
member.summary: Arranges the application windows using the specified style.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Core.AgUiWindowsCollection.Add(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new window. The bstrPluginID is a COM ProgID associated with an STK plugin.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.AgUiWindowsCollection.Count
member.summary: Returns a total number of window objects in the collection.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.AgUiWindowsCollection._NewEnum
member.summary: Enumerates the windows in the collection.

member.summary: Provides methods and properties to manage the windows.

member.summary: Creates a new window. The bstrPluginID is a COM ProgID associated with an STK plugin.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.AgUiWindowsCollectionClass.Count
member.summary: Returns a total number of window objects in the collection.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.AgUiWindowsCollectionClass._NewEnum
member.summary: Enumerates the windows in the collection.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiWindowsCollection
member.summary: Provides methods and properties to manage the application's windows.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiWindowsCollection.Arrange(AGI.Ui.Core.AgEArrangeStyle)
member.summary: Arranges the application windows using the specified style.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiWindowsCollection.Add(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new window. The bstrPluginID is a COM ProgID associated with an STK plugin.

member.summary: Returns a total number of window objects in the collection.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiWindow
member.summary: Represents a window abstraction. Provides methods and properties to manipulate the position and the state of the window.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiWindow.Caption
member.summary: The window caption. Can only be set within UI plugins for the non unique windows they own.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiWindow.NoWBClose
member.summary: Whether to close the window when the application workbook is loaded/closed.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiWindow.SupportsPinning
member.summary: Returns whether the window supports pinning.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEDockStyle.eDockStyleIntegrated
member.summary: Child window is integrated into the main window.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEDockStyle.eDockStyleDockedLeft
member.summary: Child window is docked to the left side of the within the main window.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEDockStyle.eDockStyleDockedRight
member.summary: Child window is docked to the right side of the main window.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEDockStyle.eDockStyleDockedTop
member.summary: Child window is docked to the top of the main window.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEDockStyle.eDockStyleDockedBottom
member.summary: Child window is docked to the bottom of the main window.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEDockStyle.eDockStyleFloating
member.summary: Child window is not docked or integrated.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiToolbarCollection
member.summary: Provides methods and properties to obtain a window's toolbars.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiToolbarCollection.GetToolbarByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a toolbar object with the specified toolbar identifier. The identifier is a unique number assigned to a toolbar object.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiToolbarCollection.Count
member.summary: Returns a total number of toolbars in the collection.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiToolbarCollection._NewEnum
member.summary: Enumerates the toolbars in the collection.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Core.IAgUiToolbar
member.summary: Provides methods and properties to control a toolbar.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEArrangeStyle.eArrangeStyleCascade
member.summary: Child windows are cascaded within the main window.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEArrangeStyle.eArrangeStyleTiledHorizontal
member.summary: Child windows are tiled horizontally within the main window.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Core.AgEArrangeStyle.eArrangeStyleTiledVertical
member.summary: Child windows are tiled vertically within the main window.
